name: Malignance
simpleDescription: Partner with an ally to protect each other

passives.name: Hatefog
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage to enemy champions with your ultimate ability creates a 251 â€“ 550 (based on ultimate's damage instance) radius scorched zone beneath them for 3 seconds, applying a Curse to enemies within that deals 15 magic damage (+1.25% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds (180 magic damage (+15% AP) total magic damage over the duration) and reduces their magic resistance by 10 (3 second cooldown per target, starts on zone creation).
